name: Small Talk (Jon319p)
description:
Do you hate awkward conversations with your co-workers that never go anywhere? Why not relieve that experience in this Undertale inspired bullet hell game? Survive your co-workers conversation and unlock keys to connect with them.

This was created for the Lost Relics 2022 Game Jam.

There are many features I wanted to add, such as more dialogue, animations, more battles but ran out of time. I only had about 4 days to make this and I'm pretty happy with it. I spend most of the time building a system to create multiple types of projectiles and movement patterns. Some attacks use normal physics, some are on a fix path ,and some target directly to you. There's were a lot I wanted to add but scraped due to time constrains. It is currently 5 in the morning and the Jam ends if 4 hours. This was my second Gam Jam and it was a lot of fun. I really wanted to make an Undertale like game and the theme of Connection sounded perfect for that.
